com.azure.identity

Class DeviceCodeChallenge

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.azure.identity.DeviceCodeChallenge

  • public class DeviceCodeChallenge
extends java.lang.Object
    Response returned from the STS device code endpoint containing information necessary for device code flow.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DeviceCodeChallenge(java.lang.String userCode, java.lang.String deviceCode, java.lang.String verificationUri, long expiresIn, long interval, java.lang.String message)
      Creates an instance of a device code challenge.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

    • Constructor Detail

      • DeviceCodeChallenge

        public DeviceCodeChallenge(java.lang.String userCode,
                           java.lang.String deviceCode,
                           java.lang.String verificationUri,
                           long expiresIn,
                           long interval,
                           java.lang.String message)
        Creates an instance of a device code challenge.
        Parameters:
        userCode - code which user needs to provide when authenticating at the verification URI
        deviceCode - code which should be included in the request for the access token
        verificationUri - URI where user can authenticate
        expiresIn - expiration time of device code in seconds
        interval - interval at which the STS should be polled at
        message - message which should be displayed to the user
